Summary: translucent triangle no lights flashing no sound followed path changed direction disappeared
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Long Beach
There was one other sighting in Long Beach on or around September 28th 2013
divs: sighting detailssat. morning 09\28\2013 at exactly 5am in long beach ca was heading out to store noticed 3 lighter colored circles looked like balloons or birds in formation. noticed dull surfaced very dark ...cast against dark blue sky then realized it was a triangle ufo. no sound lights were not lit like most sightings...no light source in the middle....it followed a direct path then shifted direction saw side profile ...which was pretty flat..then just disappeared. 1 other witness who saw exact same thing with me.
